solution_line_template: The cost for adult meals is {num_adults} adults * ${cost_adult_meal} = $<<{num_adults}*{cost_adult_meal}={cost_adult_meals}>>{cost_adult_meals}.
The cost for children's meals is {num_children} children * ${cost_child_meal} = $<<{num_children}*{cost_child_meal}={cost_children_meals}>>{cost_children_meals}.
The total people ordering drinks is {num_adults} + {num_children} = <<{num_adults}+{num_children}={total_people_drinks}>>{total_people_drinks}.
The cost for drinks is {total_people_drinks} people * ${cost_soda} = $<<{total_people_drinks}*{cost_soda}={cost_drinks}>>{cost_drinks}.
The total cost for the meal is ${cost_adult_meals} + ${cost_children_meals} + ${cost_drinks} = $<<{cost_adult_meals}+{cost_children_meals}+{cost_drinks}={total_bill}>>{total_bill}.
